name: CbcSolverHeuristics
brief: Heuristic setup and execution routines for cbc-generic

algorithms.name:
VUB Fixing and Heuristic Orchestration
Copyright (C) 2007, IBM Corporation and others. All Rights Reserved.
This code is licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

Helper functions used by the standalone solver for heuristic management.

crunchIt(): Compress/simplify a ClpSimplex model.

fixVubs(): Fix variable upper bound constraints.
- doAction values:
  - 0: Just fix in original, return NULL
  - 1: Return fixed non-presolved solver
  - 2: Use presolve internally
  - 3: Presolve and fix high-cost variables
  - 10+: Use lastSolution and relax a few
  - -2: Cleanup after mode 2
- Returns number of variables fixed

doHeuristics(): Configure and run heuristics.
- type 1: Add heuristics to model
- type 2: Run heuristics (set cutoff and solution)
- type 3: For miplib testing (skip some)
